spectra.observer: Angel R. Lopez-Sanchez (AAO/Macquarie U.), Lluis Galbany (U. Pittsburgh), Yago Ascasibar (UAM), Kristin Fiegert (AAO)
spectra.reducer: Angel R. Lopez-Sanchez (AAO/Macquarie U.), Lluis Galbany (U. Pittsburgh), Yago Ascasibar (UAM)
spectra.remarks: The spectrum shows typical broad features characteristic of type Ia supernovae (SNe Ia) past-maximum light. SNID gives a relible fits to all its main spectral features with spectra of normal SNe Ia at 3-4 weeks after peak brightness placed at redshift consistent with that of the host galaxy (0.065). We measure a Si II 6355 velocity of -8,700 km/s.
